title: Climate News Can Be Confusing. Here’s How to Make Sense of It.
description: Recent headlines describe how war, government policies and other factors are affecting assessments of climate change. Is a chaotic future likely? Is there cause for optimism? Both can be true.
dc:creator: Christine Hauser
media:description: Wind turbines in front of the lignite-fired Power Plant Niederaussem, operated by German energy giant RWE near Niederaussem, in western Germany.
